document.text:
From: ' 
Subject: RE: CNN - Epstein 
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2019 20:17:13 +0000 
She 
said she would get back to me with the name of the AUSA... 
From: 
Subject: Re: CNN - Epstein 
It's hard to deny when they don't provide the name of the AUSA. 
On Aug 16, 2019, at 4:11 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
I  Icy guys, 
CNN is pursuing a 
story about how and came to our Office in 
2015/2016 to raise questions about the Epstein plea deal in Florida. Apparently through (with?) their attorney, 
they talked to a sex trafficking or human trafficking AUSA (no name yet) about the issue. 
The reporter believes 
that it was not raised to senior leadership at the time and it 
went nowhere. 
CNN doesn't plan to run something immediately but knows that another reporter has similar information, 
so if they fed their competition will go with the story, they will, too. 
Any guidance or 
thoughts are welcome. 
Public Affairs 
U.S. Attorney's 
Office for 
the 
Southern District of New York 
Email: 
Website: www.justice.gov/usao-sdny
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/usaosdnv
Follow 
us on Twitter: @SDNYnews 
EFTA00018900
